name: Virus Defender (CupOfJoe)
description:
You are playing as an antivirus and you must punch viruses to destroy them.

You need to  be moving in order to hit the viruses.

Controls:

"A" and "S": Move left and right.

"W": Jump.

"K": Punch.

"V": Mute music

"B": Play music.

Also, it's kind of hard.
